speaker: President.
english: President. The Council will be here tomorrow. The Commissioner may respond today. As far as I am aware, Commissioner Dimas will be here tomorrow. Commissioner Figeľ, would you like to add anything?
original: President. The Council will be here tomorrow. The Commissioner may respond today. As far as I am aware, Commissioner Dimas will be here tomorrow. Commissioner Figeľ, would you like to add anything?
agenda_item: Fluorinated greenhouse gases – Emissions from air-conditioning systems in motor vehicles (debate)
